title: Its san serif and thin type face
content:
character 'a' hook is at the right side.

'M' middle joint is shorter than right and left arm

.'G' is curved.

You can see the attached card.

Font: 

 lane 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062252/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: azeemsulthan

comments.content:
Please identify this font. I found scene std light font nearest. But not sure. Please help me also help me where i can get this font for free.
